iShare Maps and GIS Developer Demos

Routing

Routing using Ordnance Survey Open Roads dataset, loaded into PostGIS 2.0, with PgRouting 2.2, using QGIS in the Cloud, connected to the iShare Spatial Data Warehouse.

qgis.astuntechnology.com (demo02/demo02)

Example Functions:

  • Driving Distance/Alphashape: aka polygons of all locations a given distance away from a given point
  • Shortest Path with turn restrictions (trsp(edge)): shortest path between two given points, taking notice of turn restrictions

SELECT seq, id1 AS id, cost FROM pgr_drivingdistance( ‘SELECT ogc_fid AS id, source, target, cost_len AS cost, rcost_len AS reverse_cost FROM routing.surrey_openroads’, 132231, – my node from which I am calculating distances 2000, – the distance false, – not a directed graph true – use reverse costs );

This project is maintained by AstunTechnology
